Title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
Writer: Isao Takahata (story), Isao Takahata (screenplay), Riko Sakaguchi (screenplay)
Actors: Aki Asakura, Kengo Kôra, Takeo Chii, Nobuko Miyamoto
Plot: An old man makes a living by selling bamboo. One day, he finds a princess in a bamboo. The princess is only the size of a finger. Her name is Kaguya. When Kaguya grows up, 5 men from prestigious families propose to her. Kaguya asks the men to find memorable marriage gifts for her, but the 5 men are unable to find what Kaguya wants. Then, the Emperor of Japan proposes to her.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 13 wins & 37 nominations.
